Text: Tried the first episode - it's a pity it's in mono and only medium bit rate. I'll stick with the cassette transcription I did some years ago.

I listened to it on headphones and it sounded fine. It's a trade-off. A 320 kbps bit rate would mean a ten-fold increase in file size. Would you rather DL  a 168 MB file or a 1.68 GB file? Sorry you're disappointed but some people have bandwidth constraints.
This isn't a Music album, so lower bitrate is preferable as higehr bitrate doesn't really help in case of voice, thanks to the uploader :)

thanx, but it would be better in better quality :(
quality is more important than size
thank you anyway
